channel.title: Comments on: Viewing Execution Plans in Visual Studio
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: sosad
item.dc:creator: sosad
item.description:
I go to Tools > SQL Server > New Query. I can open an existing query by going to File > Open > File and selecting a .sql file. The query window has a toolbar that has some of the same options as SSMS, although the icons look different.
___________________ GuL
item.content:encoded:
I go to Tools > SQL Server > New Query. I can open an existing query by going to File > Open > File and selecting a .sql file. The query window has a toolbar that has some of the same options as SSMS, although the icons look different.

___________________
GuL
